meaningMnemonic: Under the <radical>tree</radical> lies a <radical>turkey</radical> with a broken <radical>arrow</radical> in it. It doesn't have <kanji>rights</kanji> like humans, so people can just shoot turkeys with arrows and no one is punished.
readingMnemonic: "You have <kanji>rights</kanji>, so I won't shoot you like this turkey," says the voice of <reading>Ken</reading> (けん) the samurai, from above you in the tree.
